name: @niivue/niimath-js

scripts.build-wasm: cd src && emcc -O2 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB -s WASM=1 -DUSING_WASM -I. core32.c nifti2_wasm.c core.c walloc.c -o process-image.wasm --no-entry && cd ..
scripts.pub: npm run update-version && npm publish --access public

author: Chris Rorden, Taylor Hanayik, Chris Drake
